original_text: The priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering and put it on the doorposts of the temple, the four corners of the ledge of the altar, and the posts of the gate of the inner court.
korean_text: 제사장이 그 속죄제 희생제물의 피를 가져다가 성전 문설주와 제단 아래층 네 모퉁이와 안뜰 문설주에 바를 것이요

sentences.original_text: The priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 속죄 제물의 피를 조금 가져와서

sentences.original_text: and put it on the doorposts of the temple
the four corners of the ledge of the altar
and the posts of the gate of the inner court.
